Interface BarrelInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Barrel
public interface BarrelInterface extends Remote
Interface fornece métodos para obter informações dos storage barrels remotamente através de RMI

      índice do barrel
      Throws:
      RemoteException
